blocks.name: clnm
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of Noetherian left modules.

blocks.name: df-lnm
blocks.content: A left-module is _Noetherian_ iff it is hereditarily finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: islnm
blocks.content: Property of being a Noetherian left module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm islnm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clnm, clmod, wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig)), wral(s0, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(s0)), clfig)))
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(s0)), clfig), wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig))
  syl6eqr(cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(clss, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clss)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(s0)), clfig, co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cress, cv(s0))
  df-lnm(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clmod)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm islnm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen)))
  ⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen))), d(s0, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clnm, clmod, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen), ∀(s0 ∈(LSubSp ` hs0),(hs0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen))
  raleqbidv(s0, (LSubSp ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, (hs0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen, (c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen)
  syl6eqr((LSubSp ` hs0), c1, (LSubSp ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, clss)
  eleq1d((hs0[|`s]s0), clfig, (c0[|`s]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cress, s0)
  df-lnm(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clmod)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: islnm2
blocks.content: Property of being a Noetherian left module with finite generation expanded in terms of spans. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm islnm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  bitri(wcel(c0, clnm), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig))))
  islnm(s0, c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, clmod), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig)), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), clfig), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  islssfg2(s1, c0, cv(s0), c1, co(c0, cress, cv(s0)), c2, c3)
  eqid(co(c0, cress, cv(s0)))
  rexbii(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))
  eqcom(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, clmod)
  diff.clmod.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cress, cv(s0))
  diff.cress.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm islnm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1)))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1))))), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1))))), d(s1, c2))
  bitri(c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1)))), (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen)))
  islnm(s0, c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(c0 ∈ LMod, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1))))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, c0 ∈ LMod, (c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1)))
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c0[|`s]s0)∈ LFinGen, ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s0 =(c3 ` s1)), ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin),(c3 ` s1)= s0))
  islssfg2(s1, c0, s0, c1, (c0[|`s]s0), c2, c3)
  eqid((c0[|`s]s0))
  rexbii(s1, (P(c2)⋂ Fin), (c3 ` s1)= s0, s0 =(c3 ` s1))
  eqcom((c3 ` s1), s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, clmod)
  diff.clmod.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cress, s0)
  diff.cress.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: lnmlmod
blocks.content: A Noetherian left module is a left module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: lnmlssfg
blocks.content: A submodule of Noetherian module is finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnmlssfg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clfig))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
} = {
  mpan9(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, clfig), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, clnm), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig)), wcel(c0, clmod))
  islnm(hs0, c0, c2)
  rspcv(hs0, c1, c2, wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig), wcel(c3, clfig))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), c3, co(c0, cress, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cress)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c3, clfig))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lnmlssfg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LFinGen)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  mpan9(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ LFinGen, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0[|`s]hs0)∈ LFinGen))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ LNoeM, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0[|`s]hs0)∈ LFinGen), c0 ∈ LMod)
  islnm(hs0, c0, c2)
  rspcv(hs0, c1, c2, (c0[|`s]hs0)∈ LFinGen, c3 ∈ LFinGen)
  eleq1d((c0[|`s]hs0), clfig, c3, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((c0[|`s]hs0), c3, (c0[|`s]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, cress)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c3 ∈ LFinGen)
}

blocks.name: lnmlsslnm
blocks.content: All submodules of a Noetherian module are Noetherian. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnmlsslnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clnm))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clnm), wcel(c3, clmod), wral(hs0, cfv(clss, c3), wcel(co(c3, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(clss, c3), wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c3, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig))
  eqeltrd(co(c3, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig, co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3))))
  syl5eq(co(c3, cress, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cress, c1), cress, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3))))
  oveq1i(c3, cress, cv(hs0), co(c0, cress, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(co(co(c0, cress, c1), cress, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cress, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  simplr(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3)))
  sseqtr4d(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  lssss(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  syl(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lssss(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  ressbas2(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  ressabs(c1, c2, cv(hs0), c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)), clfig), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpll(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3)))
  simprbda(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lnmlmod(c0)
  lsslss(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(clss, c3), c3)
  lnmlssfg(c0, cv(hs0), c2, co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)))
  eqid(co(c0, cress, cv(hs0)))
  islnm(hs0, c3, cfv(clss, c3))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clss, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lnmlsslnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LNoeM)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ LNoeM, c3 ∈ LMod, ∀(hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3),(c3[|`s]hs0)∈ LFinGen))
  sylan(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ LMod)
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ralrimiva(hs0, (LSubSp ` c3), (c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3[|`s]hs0)∈ LFinGen)
  eqeltrd((c3[|`s]hs0), clfig, (c0[|`s]hs0), ((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3)))
  syl5eq((c3[|`s]hs0), (c0[|`s]hs0), ((c0[|`s]c1)[|`s]hs0), ((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3)))
  oveq1i(c3, cress, hs0, (c0[|`s]c1))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3)), ((c0[|`s]c1)[|`s]hs0)=(c0[|`s]hs0), c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  simplr(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3))
  sseqtr4d(hs0, c1, (Base ` c3), ((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3)))
  adantl((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3), hs0 ⊆(Base ` c3))
  lssss(hs0, (LSubSp ` c3), (Base ` c3), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3), c1 =(Base ` c3))
  syl(c1 ∈ c2, c1 =(Base ` c3), c1 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  lssss(c1, c2, (Base ` c0), c0)
  ressbas2(c1, (Base ` c0), c3, c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  ressabs(c1, c2, hs0, c0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3)), (c0[|`s]hs0)∈ LFinGen, c0 ∈ LNoeM, hs0 ∈ c2)
  simpll(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3))
  simprbda((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3), hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ c2, (hs0 ∈(LSubSp ` c3)↔(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)), c0 ∈ LMod)
  lnmlmod(c0)
  lsslss(c0, c1, c2, hs0, (LSubSp ` c3), c3)
  lnmlssfg(c0, hs0, c2, (c0[|`s]hs0))
  eqid((c0[|`s]hs0))
  islnm(hs0, c3, (LSubSp ` c3))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((LSubSp ` c3))
}

blocks.name: lnmfg
blocks.content: A Noetherian left module is finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnmfg(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c0, clfig))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, clfig, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, clnm))
  ressid(c0, clnm, cfv(cbs, c0))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c0)), clfig), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(clss, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(clss, c0)), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lnmlmod(c0)
  lss1(c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(clss, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  lnmlssfg(c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(clss, c0), co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c0))
  eqid(co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lnmfg(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeM → c0 ∈ LFinGen)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, clfig, (c0[|`s](Base ` c0)), c0 ∈ LNoeM)
  ressid(c0, clnm, (Base ` c0))
  mpdan(c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[|`s](Base ` c0))∈ LFinGen, (Base ` c0)∈(LSubSp ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ LNoeM, (Base ` c0)∈(LSubSp ` c0), c0 ∈ LMod)
  lnmlmod(c0)
  lss1(c0, (Base ` c0), (LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  lnmlssfg(c0, (Base ` c0), (LSubSp ` c0), (c0[|`s](Base ` c0)))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((c0[|`s](Base ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: kercvrlsm
blocks.content: The domain of a linear function is the subspace sum of the kernel and any subspace which covers the range. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)

thm kercvrlsm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cima(ccnv(c8), csn(c6)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, co(c5, clmhm, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cima(c8, c2), crn(c8)))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c4))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c4), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  lsmcl(c5, c0, c4, c2, c1)
  lssss(co(c0, c1, c2), c4, c3, c5)
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)), cima(c8, c2)))
  eleqtrrd(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)), cima(c8, c2), crn(c8), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)), crn(c8)), wfn(c8, c3))
  fnfvelrn(c8, c3, cv(hs0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cima(c8, c2), crn(c8)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wb(wcel(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)), cima(c8, c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))))), wfn(c8, c3), wss(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wfn(c8, c3))
  ffnd(c8, c3, cfv(cbs, c7), w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c8, c3, cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(c8, co(c5, clmhm, c7)))
  lmhmf(c8, c5, c7, c3, cfv(cbs, c7))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c7))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wss(c2, c3))
  fvelimab(hs1, c8, c3, c2, cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))
  rexlimdva(hs1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)))
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2))))
  ex(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cv(hs1)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(c5, cgrp))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lmodgrp(c5)
  grpnpcan(c5, cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1), cfv(csg, c5), cfv(cplusg, c5))
  syl32anc(wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cv(hs1)), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c5, clmod), wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wcel(c5, clmod))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c8, co(c5, clmhm, c7)))
  lmhmlmod1(c8, c5, c7)
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wss(c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wss(c0, c3), wcel(c0, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c8, co(c5, clmhm, c7)))
  lmhmkerlss(c8, c5, c7, c0, c4, c6)
  lssss(c0, c4, c3, c5)
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wss(c2, c3))
  biimpa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), c0))
  syl5bb(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), c0), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)), cfv(c8, cv(hs1))))
  eqcom(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wb(wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)), cfv(c8, cv(hs1))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), c0)), wcel(c8, co(c5, cghm, c7)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(c8, co(c5, cghm, c7)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c8, co(c5, cghm, c7)), wcel(c8, co(c5, clmhm, c7)))
  lmghm(c8, c5, c7)
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantrl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  sselda(cv(hs1), c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, c3), wcel(c2, c4))
  lssss(c2, c4, c3, c5)
  ghmeqker(c8, c5, c7, cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1), cfv(csg, c5), c0, c6)
  eqid(cfv(csg, c5))
  simplrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(c8, cv(hs1)), cfv(c8, cv(hs0))))
  lsmelvalix(c5, clmod, c0, c3, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c5), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c5), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c8)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c8, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)))
}

thm kercvrlsm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)= c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(LSubSp ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c7)
  ⊣ c0 =(`' c8 " { c6 })
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈(c5[LMHom]c7))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c8 " c2)= ran(c8))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, (c0[c1]c2), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[c1]c2)⊆ c3, (c0[c1]c2)∈ c4)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c1]c2)∈ c4, c5 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c4)
  lsmcl(c5, c0, c4, c2, c1)
  lssss((c0[c1]c2), c4, c3, c5)
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0)))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0)), (c8 ` hs0)∈(c8 " c2))
  eleqtrrd((c8 ` hs0), (c8 " c2), ran(c8), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c8 ` hs0)∈ ran(c8), c8[Fn]c3)
  fnfvelrn(c8, c3, hs0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c8 " c2)= ran(c8))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), ((c8 ` hs0)∈(c8 " c2)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0))), c8[Fn]c3, c2 ⊆ c3)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, c8[Fn]c3)
  ffnd(c8, c3, (Base ` c7), w0)
  syl(w0, (c8 : c3 →(Base ` c7)), c8 ∈(c5[LMHom]c7))
  lmhmf(c8, c5, c7, c3, (Base ` c7))
  eqid((Base ` c7))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, c2 ⊆ c3)
  fvelimab(hs1, c8, c3, c2, (c8 ` hs0))
  rexlimdva(hs1, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
  anassrs(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c2, ((c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0)→ hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2)))
  ex((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
  eqeltrrd(hs0, (c0[c1]c2), ((hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)[(+ ` c5)]hs1), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2))∧(c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0)))
  adantr((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), ((hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)[(+ ` c5)]hs1)= hs0)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), ((hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)[(+ ` c5)]hs1)= hs0, c5 ∈ Grp, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), c5 ∈ Grp)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ Grp, c5 ∈ LMod)
  lmodgrp(c5)
  grpnpcan(c5, hs0, c3, hs1, (-g ` c5), (+ ` c5))
  syl32anc(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2))∧(c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0)), ((hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)[(+ ` c5)]hs1)∈(c0[c1]c2), c5 ∈ LMod, c0 ⊆ c3, c2 ⊆ c3, (hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), c5 ∈ LMod)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ LMod, c8 ∈(c5[LMHom]c7))
  lmhmlmod1(c8, c5, c7)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), c0 ⊆ c3)
  syl(w0, c0 ⊆ c3, c0 ∈ c4)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ c4, c8 ∈(c5[LMHom]c7))
  lmhmkerlss(c8, c5, c7, c0, c4, c6)
  lssss(c0, c4, c3, c5)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), c2 ⊆ c3)
  biimpa((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), (hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)∈ c0)
  syl5bb((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0), (hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)∈ c0, (c8 ` hs0)=(c8 ` hs1))
  eqcom((c8 ` hs1), (c8 ` hs0))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), ((c8 ` hs0)=(c8 ` hs1)↔(hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1)∈ c0), c8 ∈(c5[GrpHom]c7), hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), c8 ∈(c5[GrpHom]c7))
  syl(w0, c8 ∈(c5[GrpHom]c7), c8 ∈(c5[LMHom]c7))
  lmghm(c8, c5, c7)
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c2)
  adantrl(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c3)
  sselda(hs1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ⊆ c3, c2 ∈ c4)
  lssss(c2, c4, c3, c5)
  ghmeqker(c8, c5, c7, hs0, c3, hs1, (-g ` c5), c0, c6)
  eqid((-g ` c5))
  simplrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c2, (c8 ` hs1)=(c8 ` hs0))
  lsmelvalix(c5, clmod, c0, c3, c2, (hs0[(-g ` c5)]hs1), hs1, (+ ` c5), c1)
  eqid((+ ` c5))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c1]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c8)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c8 ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
}

blocks.content: A homomorphism maps finitely generated submodules to finitely generated submodules. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

thm lmhmfgima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, clfig))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, cress, cima(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cress, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clfig))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c5, clmhm, c1)))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c0, clfig, co(c1, cress, cima(c2, c3)), w0)
  mpd(w0, wcel(co(c1, cress, cima(c2, c3)), clfig), wrex(hs0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)), c3)))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)), c3)), wcel(c4, clfig))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c4, clfig), wrex(hs0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)), c3))), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c3, c6))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c2, co(c5, clmhm, c1)))
  lmhmlmod1(c2, c5, c1)
  islssfg2(hs0, c5, c3, c6, c4, cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(clspn, c5))
  rexlimdva(hs0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn), w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(co(c1, cress, cima(c2, c3)), clfig))
  syl5ibcom(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(co(c1, cress, cima(c2, c3)), clfig), wcel(co(c1, cress, cima(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)))), clfig))
  eqeltrd(co(c1, cress, cima(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0)))), clfig, co(c1, cress, cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))))
  oveq2d(c1, cress, cima(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), cima(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wceq(cima(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, co(c5, clmhm, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  lmhmlsp(c2, c5, c1, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(clspn, c5), cfv(clspn, c1))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c5))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))), wcel(co(c1, cress, cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), clfig), wcel(c1, clmod), wss(cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cfn))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wcel(c1, clmod))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, co(c5, clmhm, c1)))
  lmhmlmod2(c2, c5, c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wss(cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  syl5ss(cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1), crn(c2), w0)
  imassrn(c2, cv(hs0))
  frnd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c5), w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))), wcel(cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cfn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wfo(cres(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cima(c2, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn), cfn)
  inss2(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))), wfo(cres(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cima(c2, cv(hs0))), wfun(c2), wss(cv(hs0), cdm(c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wfun(c2))
  ffund(c2, cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  sseqtr4d(cv(hs0), cdm(c2), cfv(cbs, c5), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c5), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn), cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)))
  inss1(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c5)), cfn)), wceq(cdm(c2), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  fdmd(c2, cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c2, cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c5, clmhm, c1)))
  lmhmf(c2, c5, c1, cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(cbs, c1))

thm lnmlmic(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[~=m]c1 →(c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔ c1 ∈ LNoeM))
} = {
  sylbi(c0[~ = m]c1, (c0 ∈ LNoeM ↔ c1 ∈ LNoeM), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1)))

  syl3anc((hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1)∧ c0 ∈ LNoeM), c1 ∈ LNoeM, hs0 ∈(c0[LMHom]c1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, ran(hs0)=(Base ` c1))
  adantr(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, hs0 ∈(c0[LMHom]c1))
  lmimlmhm(hs0, c0, c1)
  simpr(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), c0 ∈ LNoeM)
  adantr(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, ran(hs0)=(Base ` c1))
  3syl(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), ran(hs0)=(Base ` c1), (hs0 :(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c1)), (hs0 :(Base ` c0)↠(Base ` c1)))
  f1ofo(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))
  forn(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))
  lnmepi(hs0, c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  syl3anc((hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1)∧ c1 ∈ LNoeM), c0 ∈ LNoeM, `' hs0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c0), c1 ∈ LNoeM, ran(`' hs0)=(Base ` c0))
  adantr(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), c1 ∈ LNoeM, `' hs0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c0))
  simprbi(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), `' hs0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c0), hs0 ∈(c0[LMHom]c1))
  islmim2(hs0, c0, c1)

  dfdm4(hs0)

  syl(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), dom(hs0)=(Base ` c0), (hs0 :(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c1)))

  eqid((Base ` c1))
  f1odm(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))
  lnmepi(`' hs0, c1, c0, (Base ` c0))
